oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Oath of allegiance for Confederate soldier Berry F. Holloway
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Oath of allegiance from the Office of the Provost Marshal General of East Tennessee for Berry F. Holloway, Co. D, 1st (Carter's) Tenn. Cav. Regt., CSA. Oath reads in part: "I will forever discountenance, discourage and oppose Secession, Rebellion and the; disintegration of the FEDERAL UNIONI will not disclose anything that I may have seen or heard within the Federal linesThe violation of this oath is 'DEATH'."
